metadata.synopsis: Players note that Voss was going to meet someone important in Sharess Caress, might be worth checking out.Plays on the character who reads the note.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Read the note you get from Voss's corpse in the camp confrontation.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Voss' next destination was Baldur's Gate. We should check out Sharess' Caress when we get there.
